Days Recap: Stephanie returns home for Steve and Kayla's wedding 
Christine Fix Wednesday, February 15th, 2017 
Wednesday February 15, 2017: Rafe goes to the judge to overturn Hope's conviction, Stephanie arrives for her parents' wedding, and Kate thinks Andre should prepare that Hope could get out. Pin 
At Mandalay, Andre thinks Jennifer must know something about the key to the Orwell and came upon that particular shipment at the docks. They talk about Hope. Kate thinks Andre needs to prepare himself. She may go free. "You may be right but she has other things to atone for," Andre says. Austin and Carrie interrupt. Kate's excited to see them and hugs Austin but things are awkward between her and Carrie. Andre goes and they catch up about their time in Prague. Austin can't believe Kate's living with Andre. Kate says he has changed and she can take care of herself. Carrie takes off to the pub and Kate tells her son she doesn't think she has anything to worry about where Stefano's concerned. They discuss her always having a man but Kate insists she doesn't need one. She should have been more cautious in the past. Austin can tell she was into someone. She says she was but it never would have worked out. Austin encourages her to get him to come around to her thinking. 
At Eric's, Hope tells Eric she can prove that the same day Andre dated Hattie, millions of dollars were stolen from the bank and transferred into a Swiss bank account belonging to DiMera Enterprises by someone using Andre's user id. 
Steve arrives to Brady's Pub with a Valentine's Day box of chocolates. Shane turns up. Kimberly sends her love. Kayla thanks him. Rafe arrives and says the conviction has been reversed. There are shouts of happiness all around. Kayla goes online and sees Roman's statement. They hope Hope will see it. Kayla suggests they call off the wedding but Rafe doubts Hope would want that. The men leave and Kayla opens a gift from Caroline. Something old. Her pearls that were given to her by her dad. She calls Caroline who isn't attending the wedding, and thanks her. Stephanie shows up from Seattle. They make small talk after hugs and she expresses her happiness that her parents are getting remarried. She gives her mother something new and blue - a negligee. Carrie arrives with something borrowed - earrings. Carrie jokes about throwing frozen peas instead of rice after the wedding. 
More: Days stars share Valentine's Day photos and messages of love 
Back at Eric's, Hope has signed up for email alerts from the Spectator. She receives the notice that her conviction has been overturned and starts to cry. "I've been exonerated." She jumps into Eric's arms. "I didn't kill him," she shouts. He's stiff and doesn't smile so she apologizes for being insensitive and backs off. Eric is happy for her. He knows how she must feel. Hope believes it's time for them both to go home. He explodes and yells at her that he's not going home. "And that's final!" He starts to cry. Hope tries to comfort him and then goes back to Salem. Later, he writes some letter and puts it in a wooden box. 
Related: Stephen Nichols and Mary Beth Evans interviewed on Stayla weddings, Joe Mascolo's death and their fave storyline 
At SPD, Rafe goes to Ciara and Shawn, telling them Hope's free. He goes to tell Raines when suddenly, Hope appears out of nowhere and hugs her children. She barges into interrogation and hugs Rafe. They share a few moments and Hope thanks him. She turns herself in, ready to give a statement to Raines. She tells them how her friends on the inside got her out of prison without her knowledge and that a good Samaritan took her in and cared for her. Andre walks in, wanting to talk with Hope. Everyone files out and Andre says his deal is off. Before he decides what he wants to do with her, Hope tells him a little story about Hattie meeting a man named Alfonso Chlorizo who used classified information out of her in order to steal millions of dollars. She has proof from a security camera that it was him. Andre says, "So what?" Hope will agree to keep his name out of it when she gets her friend out of prison if he keeps quiet, too. Andre says, "I will take your bloody deal." He goes and Rafe canoodles with Hope. 
More: Soap alum Jay Bontatibus passes away at 52 
Steve and Shane walk into TBD, ready for the wedding, talking about being the only ones to know Stefano really is dead. Nobody can find out. Steve wishes he could tell Kayla. Joey arrives with hugs. They discuss life in the loft. Everything is going well for Joey, who says Jade's doing well too. Steve's proud of his son. Soon after Carrie, Marlena, and Kayla arrive, Rafe walks in with Hope. Everyone cheers that she's free.
